translation.en: ♪ I never used to take it slow ♪ ♪ Now I feel the air And take the long way home ♪
Okay, let's get you a little bit more... about there. You look great.
translation.zh: ‎好 我需要你更自然一点

translation.en: Okay, folks. Let's hold it right there.
translation.zh: ‎很好 各位 保持这个姿势

‎-工作很重要
‎-对 家族传统也很重要

translation.en: Well, we have to send out the Christmas cards the first week of December,
translation.zh:
‎我们必须在12月的第一周
‎寄出圣诞贺卡

translation.en: and we only have Luke for another day before he goes to college.
translation.zh:
‎这是路克最后一天在家了
‎然后他就要去读大学了

translation.en: You guys could just Photoshop me in.
translation.zh:
‎你们可以用修图软件
‎把我的照片合成进去

translation.en: -[phone clicks] -Yeah. I am in the car.
Can you just hold a sec?

translation.zh:
‎-尼尔森太太叫什么来着？
‎-泰瑞

translation.en: Yeah, Lola a lawyer, and Jake just married?
translation.zh: ‎喂 罗拉要做律师 詹克刚结婚？

translation.en: Hey, have a good day, guys.
translation.zh: ‎喂 祝你们今天过得愉快

translation.en: [woman] So that's it, huh? Tomorrow you've got an empty nest.
translation.zh: ‎真的要走了？明天你就是空巢老人了

translation.en: [Kate] Yes. And I was thinking, you know, with Luke out of the house,
translation.zh: ‎是啊 我在想 路克从家里搬出去之后

translation.en: maybe I should go back to work.
[Tabitha] Well, you always did love being a vet.
translation.zh: ‎你确实一直喜欢做一名兽医

translation.en: Who says you've gotta re-enter the workforce anyway?
translation.zh: ‎不过 是谁要让你重返职场的啊？

translation.en: Well, I do! I mean, what else am I gonna do?
-[glasses clink] -You guys, don't ever call us that again.
translation.zh:
‎你们真是的
‎以后不要再这样称呼我们了

translation.en: [Luke] Trunk's almost full. This is the last load.
translation.zh: ‎后备箱基本装满了 这是最后几箱了
‎带了 牙膏也带了 妈

translation.en: Thanks so much for letting me drive him.
[Kate] Aw. I'm sure you have a lot to talk about.
And you be careful on the road, okay? We will.
translation.zh:
‎-你们路上要小心 知道吗？
‎-我们会的

translation.en: -[Drew] You good to go, kiddo? -Yup! We're outta here!
translation.zh: ‎可以出发了 孩子？ ‎对！马上就走！

translation.en: [Luke] This is the last time, though.
Oh, come on! Surely it's not the last time!
Remember what you used to tell me, that I could be
translation.zh: ‎记得你以前对我说过吗？我会成为…

translation.en: an astronaut, or the president of the United States?
Well, how's that supposed to happen if I stay here?
translation.zh:
‎如果我留在家里
‎要怎么成为这些伟大的人物呢？

translation.en: It's just something that parents tell their children.
Let him get on the road before it gets dark.
translation.zh: ‎让他快点上路吧 一会儿黑天了

translation.en: and next summer you'll intern at the firm.
Okay, so we are gonna FaceTime everyday, right?
translation.zh: ‎好 我们每天都要视频通话 好吗？

translation.en: -Once a week. I love you guys. -[Kate sighs]
I'll eat, I'll breathe, I'll even wear a sweater.
translation.zh: ‎我会吃饭的 ‎我会呼吸的 我还会穿毛衣的

translation.en: I know you'll be okay, I just-- I love you so much.
translation.zh:
‎我知道你会照顾好自己的
‎我只是… 太爱你了

translation.en: and I know we haven't been spending a lot of time alone,
translation.zh:
‎我们两个一直没什么机会
‎享受二人时光

translation.en: and I know things aren't great,
translation.zh: ‎我知道我们两个关系有点疏远

translation.en: so I booked us to go on our second honeymoon.
translation.zh: ‎所以我预定了第二次蜜月旅行

translation.en: Look, I-- I waited until Luke was gone because I didn't want to upset him...
translation.zh:
‎我想等他走了再说
‎因为我不想让他难过…

translation.en: Why? [stammering] What's wrong? Are you sick?
translation.zh: ‎怎么了？有什么事吗？你生病了？

translation.en: -Well, no one's happy all the time. -Kate...
translation.zh: ‎不会有人总是幸福的 ‎凯特 我已经不爱你了

translation.en: I'm not in love with you anymore.
And I'm pretty sure you feel the same.
I'll be at the Carlyle if you need to reach me.
translation.zh: ‎如果你有事找我 我会在凯雷集团

translation.en: I don't understand, I don't understand.
Are you involved with someone else?
you're just leaving me like this with-- with no discussion?
translation.zh:
‎你就这样离开了我
‎都不和我商量一下？

translation.en: We had a lot of good years.
I think in the long run, you'll see this is better for both of us.
translation.zh:
‎你一定会明白 为了长远打算
‎分开对我们两个都好
‎（康拉德夫妇） ‎（《非洲攻略及语言》）

translation.en: It's part of the meal plan.
Could I have another one of these, please?
-♪ Making me feel all right ♪ -[man] Hey, gorgeous.
-I hope you bring cash this time. -My IOU's aren't good enough anymore?
translation.zh:
‎-希望你这次带了现金
‎-我的欠条不好使了？

translation.en: Why are you asking questions you're afraid of the answer to?
translation.zh:
‎你明知道答案是你不想听到的
‎为什么还要问呢？

translation.en: Oh, it's Mr. and Mrs. Conrad.
[Derek] I take it Mr. Conrad won't be joining us?
What, did he fall down a well?
translation.zh: ‎那是怎么了 坠井失踪了？

translation.en: Do you actually want to know where Mr. Conrad is?
translation.zh: ‎你真想知道康拉德先生去哪里了？

translation.en: he told me that our marriage was over.
translation.zh: ‎他告诉我 我们的婚姻结束了

translation.en: Two hours ago, I landed here
translation.zh: ‎两个小时之前 我在这里下了飞机

translation.en: on what was supposed to be our second honeymoon, by myself.
translation.zh:
‎自己一个人出席
‎我们第二次蜜月旅行

translation.en: In two weeks, I will be in a lawyer's office,
translation.zh: ‎两周后 我就要去找律师

translation.en: trying to get back the decades I spent
translation.zh:
‎尝试讨回
‎我在他身上花费的几十年心血

translation.en: putting him through grad school, raising our son,
translation.zh: ‎供他读研究生 抚养我们的儿子

translation.en: entertaining his clients, and somehow becoming one of the ladies who lunch.
translation.zh:
‎讨好他的客户 还莫名其妙地变成了
‎小资太太午餐团的一员

translation.en: Is there anything else that you would like to know?
I was just wondering if you were gonna eat all that food
translation.zh:
‎我只是想问 那么多食物
‎你一个人吃得完吗？

translation.en: -Thank you! -♪ Feel it in the air ♪
You have lost your touch, my friend!
But I thought it was supposed to be a...
Because we do boldly go where no tourist has gone before.
translation.zh:
‎因为我们会大胆地去探索
‎没有游客去过的地方

translation.en: Two L's, in case you want to write my name down on a complaint form.
translation.zh:
‎利益的“利”
‎告诉你怎么写 方便你写投诉信

translation.en: So I thought it was good luck to name your plane after a woman.
translation.zh:
‎给自己的飞机取一个女性的名字
‎才会有好运吧

translation.en: -Actually it's a woman you love. -[belt rattles]
translation.zh:
‎必须是自己爱的女人的名字
‎才有好运

translation.en: Truth is, this one was already named "Kira" when I got her,
translation.zh:
‎其实 我拿到它的时候
‎它已经被取名为“科娔”

translation.en: so I only had to paint over one letter.
translation.zh: ‎这样我只需要喷漆涂掉一小部分

translation.en: It's about a 40-minute flight. -[gear cranks] -to the lodge.
translation.zh: ‎需要飞40分钟到达你住宿的小木屋

translation.en: Don't let the name "lodge" fool you.
You'll be surrounded by five-star luxury.
Cessna Mike India Alpha, East tie-down, departing runway 35, Lusaka.
translation.zh:
‎赛斯纳飞机 MIA机场
‎东侧起落架 卢萨卡35跑道起飞

translation.en: We're flying over the oldest and largest game Reserve in Africa,
translation.zh:
‎我们正在飞行通过非洲最古老
‎最大的野生动物保护区

translation.en: Lion, leopard, rhino, cape buffalo, elephant.
translation.zh: ‎狮子、猎豹、犀牛、非洲水牛、大象

translation.en: [Derek] Some people say it's the most dangerous animal out here.
translation.zh: ‎有人说它们是这里最危险的动物
‎等一下 什么？停一下？停哪里？

translation.en: I need you to stay in the plane.
Stay here? [stammers] What if you don't come back?
translation.zh:
‎留在飞机上？
‎万一你不回来 我怎么办？

translation.en: -It's Derek. You read me? -[man on walkie] Yes.
translation.zh:
‎-我是德里克 你们能听到我说话吗？
‎-能听到

translation.en: We have an orphan five kilometers southwest of N'goma.
translation.zh:
‎在恩戈玛的西南方向五公里处
‎发现了一头孤儿小象

translation.en: You'll find us just north of where I landed the airplane. We'll need a truck.
translation.zh:
‎我在飞机降落的地方北侧
‎我们需要一辆卡车

translation.en: If we don't do something to help that baby, he'll be dead in two days.
translation.zh:
‎如果我们不采取措施保护小象宝宝
‎它活不过两天

translation.en: I need you to talk to him,
stay right in front of him, keep his attention.
translation.zh: ‎站在它面前 吸引它的注意力

translation.en: We gotta get him on his side, so he doesn't charge us. I got this.
translation.zh:
‎我们要让它侧躺下
‎这样它才不会攻击我们 我自己来

translation.en: Okay. I'll keep him calm, get some water out of my backpack.
translation.zh:
‎好了 我会让它冷静
‎从我的包里拿点水

translation.en: He needs to know that we're here to help him.
translation.zh: ‎它需要知道 我们是来帮它的

translation.en: Nobody in the world needs ivory, except an elephant.
translation.zh:
‎这世界上除了大象
‎没有谁需要象牙了

translation.en: What's going to happen to him?
We'll take him back to the shelter and nurse him back to health.
translation.zh:
‎我们会把它带回营地
‎照顾它 让它恢复健康

translation.en: We didn't have great luck with the last one,
but he looks like he's in a little better shape.
translation.zh: ‎这一头的状况看起来要好一些

translation.en: Let's get you to the lodge.
[Derek] You'll be sipping martinis before sunset.
translation.zh:
‎太阳落山之前
‎你就能悠闲地品酌马提尼了

translation.en: Listen, I know this is very emotional,
translation.zh: ‎听我说 我知道这件事让你很有感触

translation.en: but there's nothing you can do.
[stammers] I haven't practiced in a while, and I mostly worked on dogs and cats,
translation.zh:
‎我很久没有实际操作了
‎我主要的工作对象是猫和狗

translation.en: but I really want to help.
What do you know about elephants?
[Kate] It's gonna be okay. It's gonna be all right, little baby.
translation.zh: ‎没事的 不会有事的 小宝贝

translation.en: He's in shock. The grief of losing his family.
translation.zh: ‎它吓到了 失去家人 太过悲痛

translation.en: What can I do to help?
We have to make sure that he's hydrated and stays warm.
translation.zh:
‎我们要保证它补充足够的水
‎保持温暖

translation.en: [Jonathan] We'll get this into his ear right here.
translation.zh:
‎要把这个注射针头插进它的耳朵上
‎就在这里

translation.en: If he doesn't get up in a day's time,
We try and replicate life in the herd.
translation.zh: ‎我们努力还原它们在象群中的生活

translation.en: Each baby has a keeper, making sure they are never alone.
translation.zh:
‎每个宝宝都有一个饲养员
‎保证它们不会孤独

translation.en: We also trade off, so the calves don't get too attached to one person,
translation.zh:
‎饲养员会轮换
‎不让幼崽对某一个人产生过多感情
‎对饲养员们来说 也是一样

translation.en: When the elephants are ready to leave the nursery,
translation.zh: ‎大象可以离开庇护所的时候
‎根据它们自己的适应速度进行

translation.en: they gradually make the transition back into the wild.
translation.zh: ‎它们会逐渐过渡 适应回到野外

translation.en: And these are our living quarters,
but most of us prefer to sleep with the elephants.
translation.zh: ‎但是多数人更愿意和大象一起睡觉

translation.en: How do the older elephants react to the babies you rescue?
translation.zh:
‎年龄大一些的大象
‎对你们救回来的小象有什么反应？

translation.en: Right now we have three babies,

translation.zh: ‎四头青年大象和三头成年大象

translation.en: She's practicing to be a matriarch.
translation.zh: ‎它在练习成为象群的女族长
‎它很好奇 很喜欢管别人

translation.en: [laughs] Well, Chuma, you have some New York in you!
translation.zh: ‎楚玛 你的性格有点纽约人的感觉！

translation.en: [Jonathan] Elephants have all the emotions of humans.
A sense of humor and a sense of family.
translation.zh: ‎有幽默感 也有家庭观念

translation.en: Come. It's almost suppertime for the little ones.
translation.zh: ‎走吧 该给小象们吃晚餐了

translation.en: We feed the babies separately from the adults.
That's Kasewe. We rescued him last week.
translation.zh: ‎这是克赛维 我们上周救的它

translation.en: Why don't you get some rest?
The first tent on the end is yours,
translation.zh: ‎最尽头的第一个帐篷是你的

translation.en: and we take supper in the boma.
Jonathan said the tent on the end.
translation.zh: ‎乔纳森说让我来最尽头的第一个帐篷

translation.en: you live here, like, all the time?
Yeah, I fly the tourists to help us pay for the plane.
translation.zh:
‎对 我会载游客飞行
‎帮忙填补飞机的费用

translation.en: Oh, I put your suitcase in your tent.
translation.zh: ‎我把你的行李箱放到帐篷里了

translation.en: Forgive the mess. I'm not very good at folding.
translation.zh: ‎有点乱 抱歉 我不太会叠东西

translation.en: Kinda opened up when I threw it on the bed.
translation.zh:
‎我把箱子扔到床上的时候
‎箱子有点开了

translation.en: -So you just went through my stuff? -No.
translation.zh:
‎-然后你就翻了我的东西？
‎-没有

translation.en: But I don't think you're gonna need those high heels here.
translation.zh: ‎但是 这里应该用不上那双高跟鞋

translation.en: I don't want any more visitors.
[South African woman] No, no, no, no.
Tell him that Leslie Van Der Mere-Jones called, exclamation point!
translation.zh:
‎告诉他莱斯莉·范德米尔·琼斯
‎来过电话 感叹号！

translation.en: -[Kate] These are beautiful! -[Derek] Come on, grab a plate.
translation.zh: ‎好漂亮！ ‎过来 拿一个盘子
‎太好了 因为明天也吃这个

translation.en: And if you stay long enough,
the day after that, the day after that, and the day after that.
translation.zh:
‎日复一日 年复一年
‎一成不变 每天都吃这个

translation.en: I don't know. I didn't really mean to, but...
translation.zh: ‎我不知道 我并不是不想做了 只是…

translation.en: [stammers] I guess-- I guess life just happened.
translation.zh: ‎我的人生就自然地发展成那样了

translation.en: So you supported your husband through school,

translation.zh: ‎帮他白手起家 成就自己的事业

translation.en: Did I tell you all that?
And a lot about the ladies who lunch.
translation.zh: ‎还说了很多小资太太午餐团的事

translation.en: So you never get any of those type of surprises.
translation.zh:
‎所以它们不会给你带来
‎这种出乎意料的事情

translation.en: You don't wake up one day and someone doesn't love you anymore.
translation.zh:
‎不会在你某天早上醒来
‎就发现谁不再爱你了

translation.en: I thought Africa was known for its good coffee.
[Derek] Your first time under the southern sky?
translation.zh: ‎这是你第一次看南半球的星空吗？

translation.en: We have a telescope at home
because Luke really loved it until he fell in love with music.
translation.zh:
‎因为以前路克很喜欢
‎但他后来喜欢上了音乐

translation.en: What keeps them from coming into camp?
translation.zh: ‎什么方法能让它们不来营地？

translation.en: Yup, tonight's my shift with the orphans.
translation.zh: ‎对 今晚我值夜班 看守孤儿小象
‎给你 你自便 舒服一点

translation.en: Next time, don't walk alone out there. It's not safe.
translation.zh: ‎下次别一个人在这里走 不安全

translation.en: I mean, it's safe, but not so safe.
translation.zh: ‎这里很安全 但也有危险

translation.en: You have made me the happiest woman in the world!
translation.zh: ‎你让我成为了世界上最幸福的女人！

translation.en: Thank you! I hear that a lot.
translation.zh: ‎谢谢 我常听别人对我这样说

translation.en: I think we're gonna need more milk.
[man over walkie] Derek, you got a pick-up from the lodge. Private tour.
translation.zh:
‎喂 德里克 你要去小木屋接一个人
‎个人旅游

translation.en: Take good care of my elephant.
Nice to see you on your feet, young man!
translation.zh: ‎很高兴你能站起来 小伙子！

translation.en: It appears that you have brought us good luck.
translation.zh: ‎似乎是你给我们带来了好运

translation.en: I did nothing. I did nothing.
translation.zh:
‎-谢谢你 奥斯卡
‎-我什么都没帮上 真的

translation.en: I think this little calf would disagree.
translation.zh: ‎这个小家伙一定不会这样认为

translation.en: This is the biggest baby I've ever fed, definitely bigger than the last one.
translation.zh:
‎这是我喂过的最大的宝宝
‎比我上一个喂的宝宝大多了

translation.en: I do. I have a son.
Then we shall call this one Manu.
[Kate] Oh, Manu, I hope you like your new name!
translation.zh: ‎马努 希望你喜欢这个新名字

translation.en: How long have you lived with them?
translation.zh: ‎你和它们生活在一起多久了？

translation.en: I grew up on the reserve.
He moved here when he was 16.
Our fathers were game wardens together.
translation.zh: ‎我们俩的父亲都是狩猎督察员
‎他就像是我烦人的哥哥一样

translation.en: I wish I could stay longer.
translation.zh: ‎真希望我能在这里多留几天

translation.en: Oh, you know what? No one really calls me that.
translation.zh: ‎你知道吗？没有人这样叫过我

translation.en: Did you not earn the title?
The local vet comes around once a month, if we're lucky.
translation.zh:
‎幸运的时候
‎我们当地的兽医每个月才来一次

translation.en: You're hungry for your milk. I'll go get it.
translation.zh: ‎你饿了 想喝奶了 我去拿

translation.en: -Good morning, Jonathan! -Good morning, Dr. Kate. Shift change.
translation.zh:
‎-早上好 乔纳森
‎-早上好 凯特医生 我来换班

translation.en: You know, I could stay a little longer.
translation.zh: ‎其实 我可以再多留一会儿

translation.en: Better not. We don't want him missing you.
translation.zh: ‎最好不要了 我们不希望它太思念你

translation.en: Your return ticket is for September 28th, right?
translation.zh: ‎你的返程机票是在9月28日 对吧？

translation.en: Time flies when you're out here.
Lookin' at your fancy African vacay pics?
translation.zh: ‎在看你漂亮的非洲度假照吗？

translation.en: This Christmas. It was supposed to be our Christmas card.
translation.zh:
‎这个圣诞节
‎本来是要印在圣诞贺卡上的

translation.en: Hence the staged glamour of it all.
translation.zh: ‎所以才有一种刻意表演出来的魅力
‎你现在是艺术作品批评家了

translation.en: and you didn't get to go on your fancy five-star safari,
translation.zh: ‎你没有去奢华的五星级非洲野外游

translation.en: let me take you on one.
But with the value of five.
-Sometimes I come out here to paint. -Mm-hm.

translation.zh: ‎有时候我来这里 什么都不做

translation.en: -will start mingling with the wild herd. -Mm.
And then they might start staying out for one or two nights at a time.
translation.zh: ‎偶尔会在外面住 每次一两宿

translation.en: Chuma over there has been wandering off.
translation.zh: ‎那边的楚玛已经开始外宿了

translation.en: One night she's just gonna decide she's not coming home,
translation.zh: ‎会有一天晚上 它决定不再回家了

translation.en: and from that time on, she'll be a wild elephant again.
translation.zh: ‎那时候 它就再次变成野生大象了

translation.en: -Don't you get sad when they leave? -I used to.
translation.zh:
‎-它们离开的时候 你不会难过吗？
‎-以前会

translation.en: But they're meant to live in the wild.
[sighs] My son just left for college.
translation.zh: ‎我儿子刚离开家 去读大学了

translation.en: In a dorm room one state over,
Just because we don't see them
doesn't mean that they're not still a part of us.
translation.zh: ‎不代表我们心里没有他们了

translation.en: But it wasn't in the cards.
translation.zh: ‎但我的命里没有这样的安排

translation.en: How long have you been divorced?

translation.zh: ‎感觉像上辈子的事了 那时

translation.en: She had a gallery in town.
And then she got ill, and when she passed...
translation.zh: ‎后来她病了 然后就去世了…

translation.en: When you first get married, you think, "Well, that's it.
translation.zh:
‎第一次结婚的时候
‎你会想“定下来了

translation.en: Everything is just gonna be fine now."
Now I've gotta go back home, and I don't know what I'm supposed to do with myself.
translation.zh:
‎结果现在我要回到家里
‎不知道自己以后要怎么做

translation.en: Taking a second honeymoon with myself?
I'm good. How are you? How's school?
translation.zh: ‎我很好 你呢？学校怎么样？

translation.en: Well, I took a little detour,
and now I'm in this place surrounded by wild animals.
translation.zh:
‎我现在所在的地方
‎身边都是野生动物

translation.en: -[student] Hey, go long! Go long! -[laughing through screen]
chapati with tomato and goat cheese,
a.k.a. New York thin crust pizza.
Now this makes me wanna be a lady who lunches.
translation.zh:
‎这东西
‎让我也想加入小资太太午餐团了

translation.en: And I just wanna say to all of you,
because these last few weeks have meant more to me than you can ever know.
translation.zh:
‎因为过去的这几周时间 给我的意义
‎让人难以想象

translation.en: So even though I'm gonna be far away,
I want you to know that I'm never gonna forget any of you.
translation.zh:
‎我想让你们知道
‎我永远不会忘记你们

translation.en: [Derek] You really have a telescope on the 15th floor?
translation.zh:
‎你真的在15层的公寓上
‎有一个望远镜？

translation.en: The flickering lights of about a million TVs. [chuckles]
Come on. I wanna show you something.
Oh, I've already seen your tent.
I think you were looking at more than the tent.
you can look through your telescope at all the fabulous televisions,
translation.zh: ‎可以用望远镜看到各种有趣的电视

translation.en: This is Leslie Van Der Mere-Jones. She's with the foundation
translation.zh: ‎这是莱斯莉·范德米尔·琼斯 ‎她是支撑我们运转的基金会成员
‎她是支撑我们运转的基金会成员

translation.en: Well, it's late so I'm just going to head back to my tent.
I never met someone with five last names.
translation.zh: ‎我从没遇见过姓氏那么长的人

translation.en: It's on me. I just should've stuck with my first impression.
translation.zh:
‎是我的问题
‎我应该坚持我对你的第一印象

translation.en: You're lonely but you don't know it,
translation.zh: ‎你很孤独 你自己不知道

translation.en: so you just use all your thing
to get what you need in the moment and you don't think about anybody else.
translation.zh:
‎去得到现在需要的东西
‎不为别人考虑

translation.en: [Jonathan] Well, someone doesn't want you to leave.
How long does it take her to pack?
-[Jonathan] She's not going. -What do you mean?
Don't flatter yourself. It's not you.
He has a gray trunk, weighs 600 pounds
translation.zh:
‎她爱上的家伙有灰色的鼻子
‎体重270千克

translation.en: and he has a drinking problem.
Yeah, I guess I never saw that coming.
Dear Luke, I know I've exceeded my weekly FaceTime allotment,
translation.zh:
‎亲爱的路克
‎我知道我们这周已经视频通话过了

translation.en: so I'm writing this email to tell you that
I have decided to stay out here a little longer.
translation.zh: ‎我决定再在这里多留一阵子

translation.en: -[upbeat Christmas song playing] -♪ Santa's coming to town, town ♪ ♪ And he's bringing joy For all the kids around, 'round ♪
♪ What took you so long? I needed you ♪
How are you today? Are you ready for your check-up?
translation.zh: ‎你今天过得好吗？ ‎准备好做检查了吗？

translation.en: -[birds chirping] -[Jonathan] Come on. It's Christmas week!
translation.zh: ‎别一脸抑郁 这周就是圣诞节了

translation.en: Our families are almost here. Cheer up!
translation.zh: ‎我们家人就快来了 开心起来

translation.en: But you will hear them. They are very loud. [chuckles]
translation.zh: ‎来了你会听到的 他们很吵的

translation.en: [chuckles] I can't wait to meet them.
One day maybe we can meet your family, too.
translation.zh: ‎或许有一天 我们能见到你的家人

translation.en: but my son is gonna stay at college this year with his friends.
translation.zh: ‎但我儿子今年会和朋友们留在学校

translation.en: Dr. Kate, I realize that you're away from your family this Christmas,
translation.zh:
‎凯特医生 我知道
‎你今年圣诞节无法和家人团聚

translation.en: but I want you to know that you're a part of ours now.
translation.zh:
‎但我想让你知道
‎你现在是我们这个大家庭的一员了

translation.en: Go say hi to Uncle Derek.
You guys have gotten so big.
Hey, I wrestle elephants for a living. You're just a little rabbit to me.
translation.zh:
‎我的工作是和大象摔跤
‎你对我来说简直是一只小白兔

translation.en: Hi! Jonathan has written much about you.
translation.zh: ‎你好 乔纳森在信里没少提到你

translation.en: So nice to finally meet you.
I'm Lulu, and this is my sister, Nia.
translation.zh: ‎我叫露露 这是我妹妹尼雅

translation.en: Oh, you guys are adorable! Let's get some treats! Let's go!
translation.zh:
‎你们太可爱了！
‎我们去吃点零食！走吧！

translation.en: -[Aliyah] Hi, Derek! -Good to see you! How are you?
translation.zh:
‎-嗨 德里克
‎-很高兴见到你 过得好吗？

translation.en: [Nia] Now you can look at this.
Ooh, I see this is a tent.
-[Kate] Who are these? -Oh, this one is you.
-[Kate] Oh! -And this one is Uncle Derek.
Well, I like it, but there's just one problem.
translation.zh: ‎我很喜欢 只是有一个问题

translation.en: Is that handsome fellow supposed to be me?
And why is he missing a hand?
Well, it isn't actually for me.
-Well, you know, maybe just a little bit. -[paper tears]
I see you've done this before.
[chuckles] Only about twice a day for the last 20 years.
translation.zh: ‎过去20年里 也就是每天两次吧
‎来自那个传说中的某某伴侣

translation.en: Oh, and did you read it, too?
-Hm. Does not look like a Christmas card. -[paper rustling]
Mr. Conrad is filing for divorce.
I'm gonna go see my elephant.
He seems to be doing fine.
You know, I always wanted more animals,
but Drew didn't want pet hair on his clothes.
translation.zh: ‎但是德鲁不想让衣服上有宠物的毛

translation.en: I mean, I just should've seen this coming. I...
translation.zh:
‎我是说 我早就应该预料到
‎会有今天的

translation.en: Without change, there would be no butterflies.
translation.zh: ‎没有巨变 就不会有破茧成蝶

translation.en: I gotta go check on those cookies.
Chuma must've opened the gate somehow, Manu followed.
translation.zh:
‎一定是楚玛把门搞开了
‎马努跟了出去

translation.en: -I'll fly out first light to look for him. -First light is too late.
translation.zh: ‎天一亮 我就会飞出去找它 ‎天亮再飞就太晚了

translation.en: -They'll take care of each other. -You don't know that.
translation.zh:
‎-它们会互相照顾的
‎-这个不一定啊

translation.en: Sometimes you gotta let them wander.
translation.zh: ‎有时候 你要让它们出去转转

translation.en: But he's still just a baby. Anything could happen.
translation.zh: ‎但它还是个宝宝 可能会发生意外

translation.en: Wait, what are you doing? Why are we stopping?
translation.zh: ‎等一下 你在做什么？为什么停车？

translation.en: We've been at this for a while. Need to get some sleep.
translation.zh: ‎我们已经找了很久了 ‎需要睡一觉

translation.en: It's as good a place as any.
But shouldn't we keep looking for them?
translation.zh: ‎我们不是应该继续找它们吗？

translation.en: I lost Luke one time in a shopping mall. Christmas time.
translation.zh:
‎有一次圣诞节
‎我在商场里弄丢了路克

translation.en: Yeah, but there weren't any poachers in that mall.
translation.zh: ‎对 但是商场里没有偷猎者啊

translation.en: Looks like you put on some pounds.
-Was smaller than Manu when I found him. -[door closes]
translation.zh: ‎我当初找到它的时候 比马努还小

translation.en: We didn't think he'd make it.
How long have you known him?
I remember once Jonathan's father walked into the park,
translation.zh:
‎我记得有一次
‎乔纳森的父亲走进公园

translation.en: an elephant came out of the bush to greet him.
translation.zh:
‎一头大象从灌木丛中走出来
‎和他打招呼

translation.en: It'd been 37 years since they'd seen each other.
translation.zh: ‎他当时已经有37年没见过那头大象了

translation.en: It was so nice to meet you!
[man over walkie] Hey, Derek, good news.

translation.zh: ‎守林人看到了我们丢的大象们

translation.en: They're at that pond south of Kadma.
Now this is a merry Christmas Eve!
[man over walkie] Hey, Derek. Got a last-minute pick-up for ya.
translation.zh:
‎嗨 德里克 有人需要你临时去接一下
‎快回来

translation.en: Well, it's not Christmas in Africa without goat stew.
translation.zh:
‎如果没有炖羊肉
‎就不是正宗的非洲圣诞节了

translation.en: a man cannot resist a good goat stew.
translation.zh: ‎男人无法拒绝好吃的炖羊肉

translation.en: I hear your friend Derek loves a good goat stew.
translation.zh:
‎听说你的朋友德里克
‎很喜欢好吃的炖羊肉

translation.en: -He and I, we're-- we're just friends. -Hm.
-Derek needs you at the air strip. -Why? Is he okay?
translation.zh:
‎-德里克需要你去航带
‎-怎么了？他还好吧？

translation.en: I picked you up a little holiday cheer for Christmas Eve.
translation.zh: ‎我给你带了圣诞前夜狂欢的节日礼物

translation.en: Figured I'd check on you, make sure you're wearing a sweater.
translation.zh:
‎我想过来看看你
‎看你有没有把毛衣穿好

translation.en: Pleasure to meet Dr. Kate's first son.
translation.zh: ‎很高兴见到凯特医生的第一个儿子

translation.en: What are you even doing here?
Yeah, we had to drop out. My finals schedule screwed everything up.
translation.zh:
‎我们被迫退出了
‎我的期末考试安排毁掉了一切

translation.en: All right, I'm gonna take this stuff back to the tent,
translation.zh: ‎好 我要把这些东西带回帐篷

translation.en: so you guys can catch up. Next time you fly, one hand on the yoke.
translation.zh:
‎让你们两个好好聊聊
‎你下次再开飞机 一只手放在摇杆上

translation.en: He let me push a few levers. Seems like a nice guy.
translation.zh:
‎他让我推动了几次手柄
‎感觉是个不错的人

translation.en: I wanted to name this one Sadie.

translation.zh:
‎-它长得确实有点像外婆
‎-对吧？

translation.en: -♪ The silent stars go by ♪ -[Derek] Yeah!
You know, I haven't seen you do that in a long time.
translation.zh:
‎你知道嘛
‎我已经很久没看到你这样了

translation.en: If I've learned anything here, it's to not get too attached.
translation.zh:
‎我在这里学到的重要一课
‎就是不要付出太多感情

translation.en: Not everything has to end badly.
translation.zh: ‎不是所有的事情 都会以悲剧结束

translation.en: It's not gonna end, 'cause it never really started.
translation.zh:
‎永远都不会结束的
‎因为从来都没有开始

translation.en: Okay, everyone, let's take a picture together.
translation.zh: ‎好 大家一起拍一张照片

translation.en: On three, everyone say Merry Christmas, all right?
translation.zh:
‎我数到三
‎所有人喊“圣诞快乐” 好吧？

translation.en: I think I just found next year's Christmas card.
translation.zh: ‎我想 我找到了明年圣诞贺卡的照片

translation.en: That beats the one we took in August.
translation.zh: ‎比我们八月份拍的那张好多了

translation.en: Well, it was really nice of your father to send you.
translation.zh: ‎你爸把你送过来 真的很好

translation.en: Got an apartment near the office.
translation.zh: ‎在办公室旁边买了一间公寓

translation.en: The usual, [sighs] working, schmoozing clients. All that fun stuff.
translation.zh:
‎和平常一样 工作、讨好客户
‎做那些“有趣”的事

translation.en: You know, I get why you don't want to come back.
translation.zh: ‎我能理解 你为什么不想回去

translation.en: You and Dad never really liked the same things.
translation.zh: ‎你和爸喜欢的东西 从来都不一样

translation.en: The truth is, I'm surprised you stayed together as long as you did.
translation.zh:
‎说实话 我很意外
‎你们居然能坚持在一起这么久

translation.en: it wasn't bad. It was just...
Remember when we brought home that stray dog, and Dad made us give him away?
translation.zh:
‎记得我们带回家的那只流浪狗吗？
‎后来我爸逼我们送人那只

translation.en: Well, now you get to keep that stray dog.
translation.zh: ‎现在 你可以养那只流浪狗了

translation.en: Yeah, you know, Comet, Cupid, Blixen.
translation.zh:
‎对 彗星麋鹿
‎丘比特麋鹿、闪天麋鹿

translation.en: I don't usually let people peek at my doodles.
translation.zh: ‎我通常不会让别人偷看我的涂鸦

translation.en: Many times, even after they're done.
translation.zh: ‎很多时候 画完了也不让别人看
‎其实那只麋鹿叫“闪电” 不是“闪天”

‎那几只麋鹿是鲁道夫
‎猛冲者、跳舞者

translation.en: They teach you that in vet school?
Yeah, I've heard it called that.
I don't usually say that about humans.
And while we're in the Christmas spirit,
I should say that it hasn't been completely awful having you here either.
translation.zh: ‎我应该说 有你在这里 其实也不赖

translation.en: you're really not as terrible as I thought you were at first.
translation.zh: ‎你并不像我一开始想象得那样糟糕

translation.en: [laughs] That is most definitely -not mistletoe. -That is African mistletoe.
translation.zh:
‎-那肯定不是槲寄生
‎-那是非洲版本的槲寄生

translation.en: And even though we're in Africa,
we still celebrate the same worldwide mistletoe traditions.
translation.zh:
‎但全世界的圣诞节
‎都有在槲寄生下亲吻的传统

translation.en: You know, Freshman year is always a huge adjustment.
translation.zh:
‎你要知道 大学第一年是适应期
‎都要有很大的调整

translation.en: I'm sure it's going to get better.

translation.zh:
‎-应该会吧
‎-奥利维亚怎么样了？

translation.en: Yeah, it's been a bit rough with the distance.
I don't mean to pry, but--
translation.zh: ‎我不是想刺探情报 但是…

translation.en: Please tell me those aren't what I think they are.
translation.zh:
‎千万别告诉我
‎那是你给我搞的那个东西

translation.en: How else am I supposed to measure an elephant?
translation.zh: ‎不然我要怎么测量大象的成长？

translation.en: Come here. I'm so happy you're here.
translation.zh: ‎过来 你能来 我真的好开心

translation.en: It's the best Christmas present ever.
Hey! Are you still Christmas shopping?
translation.zh: ‎嗨 你还在为圣诞节购物吗？

translation.en: [Trish] I'm having Christmas lunch with Tabitha.
[sighs] I just could not face that empty apartment for the holidays.
translation.zh:
‎我没办法面对
‎一个人在空荡荡的公寓里过节

translation.en: He flew in yesterday to surprise me!
translation.zh: ‎他昨天飞过来 给了我一个惊喜！

translation.en: This year, it's gonna be Christmas in Africa.
And what is Christmas in Africa?
Well, I can't speak for the whole continent,
translation.zh: ‎我无法说出整个非洲大陆怎么过

translation.en: but here at the elephant orphanage,
they celebrate all week, and there's no shopping involved.
translation.zh: ‎会庆祝一整周 没有购物活动

translation.en: Well, you know what they say here?
they say, "When the time is right."
Okay. Now I'm really starting to worry.
translation.zh: ‎好吧 我现在真的开始担心了

translation.en: Time goes so slowly out here.
I'm so proud of you, too!
Well, I hope you still feel that way after I tell you what I'm gonna tell you.
translation.zh:
‎呃… 我希望你听完
‎我接下来要说的话以后 还能这样想

translation.en: I'm really not into the business major.
What do you want to study?
Now, see, that's not exactly it.
College is a waste of time for me.
translation.zh: ‎对我来说 上大学是浪费时间

translation.en: And please don't say anything to Dad, I haven't told him yet.
translation.zh: ‎求你别跟爸说 我还没告诉他

translation.en: you cannot just drop out of college.
Well, you left for Africa with no return date, and look at you! You're happy!
translation.zh:
‎你来到非洲 不知道什么时候回去
‎看看你现在 这么快乐！

translation.en: Yeah, because I'm not waiting 20 years to do what I really wanna do.
translation.zh:
‎对 因为我不会等20年
‎才去做自己真正想做的事情

translation.en: Well, my kid kinda got me out of the Christmas spirit.
Why don't you wait till then to miss him?
translation.zh: ‎你等到明天 再去想他吧

translation.en: The problem is that he just announced that he's going to drop out of school,
translation.zh: ‎问题是他刚刚宣布 他要辍学

translation.en: play in a band, move in with his friends, and then write his own music in Starbucks.
translation.zh:
‎去乐队演奏 搬去和他的朋友们住
‎然后在星巴克里创作自己的音乐

translation.en: Isn't that how The Beatles started?
translation.zh: ‎甲壳虫乐队就是这样起家的吧？

translation.en: You don't understand! You don't even have kids!
translation.zh: ‎你不会明白的！你又没有孩子！

translation.en: [stammering] I'm just... I'm terrible company. I'm gonna go to bed.
translation.zh: ‎我… 我真不会聊天 我还是去睡觉吧

translation.en: All right, I want you to think about what I said, okay?
translation.zh:
‎好 我希望你能
‎仔细考虑我说的话 好吗？

translation.en: I love you, Mom, but I'm not changing my mind.
translation.zh: ‎我爱你 妈 但我不会改变我的主意

translation.en: -I love you so much. -I love you, too.
I'll text you when I land in Newark.
translation.zh: ‎我在纽约落地之后 给你发短信

translation.en: He's a good kid. He's gonna be fine.
translation.zh: ‎他是个好孩子 他会做好的

translation.en: I just feel guilty, you know?
I feel like I should've been there for him.
translation.zh: ‎我感觉 我应该陪在他身边的

translation.en: -I never meant to stay this long. -[exhales]
translation.zh: ‎我也没想到 我会留这么久

translation.en: I know. You're gonna miss me.
-That's not even what I was gonna say. -Oh, you're not gonna miss me?
translation.zh: ‎那不是我想说的 ‎你不会想我？

translation.en: [chuckles] It's okay, 'cause I'm gonna miss you.
translation.zh: ‎没事的 因为我会想你的

translation.en: I was going to surprise you with a Christmas present,
translation.zh: ‎我本来想给你一个圣诞惊喜礼物

translation.en: but now I'm not so sure.
I don't think I've seen you paint anything but scenery.
translation.zh: ‎我没看过你画风景之外的东西

translation.en: Thought I'd give something else a try.
How's that turning out for you?
So I guess not very well.
People come to see the animals, and then they go home.
translation.zh: ‎人们过来看动物 然后就回家了

translation.en: Come to Cape Town with me. We'll see out the holidays there.
translation.zh:
‎和我去开普敦吧
‎我们去看看那边的节日

translation.en: Whatever this is we've been doing...
Well, I regret to inform you
translation.zh: ‎那么 我很遗憾地通知你

translation.en: that the board has decided to terminate funding as of the new year.
translation.zh: ‎董事会决定终止新一年的资助

translation.en: This isn't about us. This is about the elephants.
translation.zh:
‎别把私人感情牵扯进来
‎资助是为了大象

translation.en: It's not about the bloody elephants for me.
translation.zh:
‎对我来说
‎可不是为了什么该死的大象

translation.en: -Jonathan will drive you. -Oh. You're not gonna--
translation.zh: ‎乔纳森会开车送你 ‎你不会来…

translation.en: I have some tourists I have to fly out.
Well, you'd better be nice to those tourists,
translation.zh: ‎你最好对那些游客友好一点

translation.en: 'cause you just don't know how they're gonna turn out.
translation.zh:
‎因为你不知道
‎他们会和你有怎样的故事

translation.en: If you come back here, I'll be here.
translation.zh: ‎如果你什么时候想回来 我会在这里

translation.en: I guess I did see that one coming.
translation.zh: ‎我应该预料到的 你总有一天会离开

translation.en: No. She's not returning my calls.
I'm thinking of flying down there,
talking to the board myself, see if I can get them to change their mind.
translation.zh:
‎亲自和董事会谈谈
‎看他们能否改变主意

translation.en: You remember what happened last time?
translation.zh: ‎你还记得上次发生了什么吗？

translation.en: I will think before I speak
I really love animals, and I miss working with them so much.
translation.zh:
‎我真的很喜欢动物
‎我好怀念和动物一起工作的日子

translation.en: Yes, I know they're not your typical clientele,
translation.zh:
‎对 我知道你们常见的客人中
‎没有大象

translation.en: but I'm also familiar with antelope, rhino and the occasional baboon.
translation.zh:
‎但我对羚羊、犀牛
‎还有偶尔出现的狒狒也很熟悉

translation.en: Thank you. Everyone calls me Dr. Kate.
translation.zh: ‎谢谢 现在大家都叫我凯特医生

translation.en: I mean, you'd be getting a college degree, and you'd be doing something you love.
translation.zh:
‎你可以拿到大学学位
‎还可以同时做自己喜欢的事情

translation.en: I dunno. It's not really what I had in mind.
translation.zh: ‎我不知道 这和我构想的不一样

translation.en: And it'd be really good for your musical career.
translation.zh: ‎会对你的音乐事业很有帮助的

translation.en: I dunno. It's a lot to think about.
translation.zh: ‎我不知道 要考虑的事情好多

translation.en: Can I have a night to sleep on it?
Of course, of course! Let's go get lunch.
He stays in college, but he studies something that he loves.
translation.zh:
‎这样他能读完大学
‎还能学习他喜欢的东西

translation.en: You're really okay with our son being...
You know, it's his passion! I mean, when else is he going to get to try it?
translation.zh:
‎这是他喜欢的东西 不然他要
‎什么时候开始去做自己喜欢的事？

translation.en: When he's 50 and he's in a job that he hates?
translation.zh:
‎等他50岁了
‎做着一份自己讨厌的工作的时候？

translation.en: he is never going to be you.
We just have to help him be himself.
I know I said I wouldn't worry, but...
translation.zh: ‎我知道自己说过 我不会担心 但是…

translation.en: Good. [stammers] And how are you? How is everyone?
translation.zh: ‎太好了 你怎么样？大家都怎么样？

translation.en: Derek wouldn't want me to say anything. But...
translation.zh: ‎德里克不想让我告诉你 但是…

translation.en: Derek got some emergency funding from another foundation,
translation.zh:
‎德里克从其他的基金会
‎搞来了一笔紧急资金

translation.en: but if we don't figure out something long-term and soon,
translation.zh:
‎但如果我们不想办法
‎快点找到一个长期的资金来源

translation.en: I don't think we'll last much past June of next year.
Well, no, no, no, that can't happen!
Looks like we don't need the foundation.
Not for a very long time.
[Jonathan] At least not until next Christmas.
translation.zh: ‎至少到明年圣诞节 都不需要了

translation.en: -[Derek] How are you? -[man] Hi, how are you?
All right, what is this? Is it a thorn?

translation.zh: ‎没有人丢了这颗钻石 要找吗？

translation.en: -[door opens] -[woman] King Charles in room needs a teeth cleaning,
translation.zh: ‎二号房的“查理斯国王”需要洗牙

translation.en: Wait, that is the third time this week!
translation.zh: ‎不是吧 这周已经来三次了！

translation.en: And may I say that's a very nice sweater!
And a refill on her antidepressants.
[stammers] Just give me one second, okay?
Is that how we're doing things now?
Maybe I should get you a bottle, cheer you up a bit.
translation.zh:
‎或许我应该给你搞一瓶牛奶
‎让你开心一下

translation.en: I have a pick-up. You want anything?
translation.zh: ‎我要去接游客 你需要什么吗？

translation.en: Are we up for some poker tonight?
Taking some tourist into the bush.
Two weeks ago, I sold my apartment.
translation.zh: ‎两个星期之前 我卖掉了公寓

translation.en: Two days ago, I bought a one-way ticket.
translation.zh: ‎两天之前 我买了一张单程票

translation.en: And two minutes ago, I walked in here after a very long journey.
translation.zh:
‎两分钟之前 我经过长途旅程
‎走进了这里

translation.en: Well, I hope you're ready for another one.
translation.zh: ‎希望你准备了再经历一段长途旅程

translation.en: -[wistful music playing] -[Kate] Manu, I'm really gonna miss you.
I'm gonna think about you every day,
and I want you to know not to be scared out there.
translation.zh: ‎我想让你这知道 到了外面 不要害怕

translation.en: You're gonna do great because you are smart
translation.zh: ‎你会生活得很好 因为你很聪明

translation.en: and you are brave. Okay, baby?
Go live your life, all right?
And now I let him go just like that?

translation.zh: ‎你觉得 它会记得我们吗？
